name: Miner Wars
description:
Miner Wars is a small 1v1 game made as a class project, using Unity and the Photon networking plugin, currently in a rough alpha state.

Players engage in combat to take away the other players score while destroying rocks to gain their own score, players can purchase items and/or upgrades to get an edge against the other player.

There may be latency issues as of this build players can't choose the games they wish to join, so you will be joining a random player who could be a great distance away.
